events.name: Digital Transformation with Cloud: Tango with Bluemix
events.description: IBM Bluemix is a Platform-as-a-Service (Paas) that supports several programming languages and services as well as integrated DevOps to build, run, deploy and manage applications on the cloud. This session will cover the following: - Fundamentals of Bluemix - DevOps Services and Bluemix - Big Data and Analytics on Bluemix - Financial IT Academy @ SMU - Showcase for finance industry. - Handson with Bluemix This event is co-sponsored by Financial IT Academy @ SMU Target Audience: Enterprise and SME - IT/Developers/Techie LOB *Bring your own laptop Register here for your Bluemix account.
events.location: SMU, School of Info Systems, Room 3-3, 80 Stamford Road , Singapore

events.name: PUGs Meetup June-2015
events.description: We are now a strong groups of 100 Postgresites! And some of us have come after an expereince with proprietary database e.g. Oracle, SQL Server. And Wei-Shan is one of them. \m/ Join us as he will share his own story of this transformation from being an Oracle DBA to a PostgreSQL DBA. Meanwhile the commitfest for v9.5 was recently concluded and there are some really exciting tihngs coming to PostgreSQL v9.5. Let's discuss them briefly. So there is a lot Postgres to be discussed! Come join and bring your friends and colleagues...

events.name: Windows 10 Universal Apps | C# Coding for Absolute Beginners
events.description: Hi All, We will be having a community meetup on Windows 10 Universal Apps Development that can target any Windows 10 devices. This is a full coding (no slides) meetup to develop apps in Windows 10 Universal App using Visual Studio 2015 RC. This will be full C# coding for beginner . And we will also highlight how to use MVVM (Model - View - View Model) and a bit of Win2D (Win2D is an extension of the high performance Graphics API that uses DirectX). We will do some demo coding of graphics/games using Win2D . If you want to follow the coding part, please BYOL (Bring Your Own Laptop). And please have it ready the laptops with Windows 10 Insider Preview installed and Visual Studio 2015 RC installed. If not, you can just come and join the meetup. It will be full of knowledge and very good if you are a beginner in C#. There will be also experts in C#/.NET at the meetup in case you need to ask deep questions on C#/.NET. See you at the meetup.
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard
